string.name: stripe_camera_permission_denied_message
string.description: Message shown to the user when camera permission is denied

resources.string: Please allow camera access to scan your card

string.name: stripe_camera_permission_denied_ok
string.description: Affirmative button shown as part of the permission denied dialog

string.name: stripe_camera_permission_denied_cancel
string.description: Negative button shown as part of the permission denied dialog
